Direct Known Subclasses:
SampleScoreboardClient
public abstract class ScoreboardClient
extends BaseClient

An abstract PC2 Scoreboard Client that uses BaseClient

This Class contains all the "handle" methods required to implement a Scoreboard Client. Instead of figuring out which handle methods need to be used from BaseClient, this class has been used to create the PC2 Scoreboard Client.

Prerequisites:
- Extend this class
- Create Scoreboard accounts on admin

Important details:
- Remember to use loggoffPC2() before exiting

See Also:
BaseClient, Serialized Form

handleClientRefresh

public abstract void handleClientRefresh()
Description copied from class: BaseClient
When a site is reset (all runs and clars cleared)

This is invoked when this client needs to refresh all its internal run and clar lists/grids.

Should be overridden by every Client.

Overrides:
handleClientRefresh in class BaseClient

handleNewRun

public abstract void handleNewRun(RunInfoAndFiles run)
Each time a new run is submitted to a PC2 Server this method is called passing run information and files to this method.

Note: one can extract the files from RunInfoAndFiles using RunInfoAndFiles.writeUserFile(int,String) .

Overrides:
handleNewRun in class BaseClient
Following copied from class: pc2.ex.BaseClient
See Also:
RunInfoAndFiles, handleNewRun
